input: Which of the following features is/are contrary to the norms of a federal polity? P. Common All India Service Q. Single integrated judiciary Select the correct answer using the codes given below
explanation: India is a Quasi-Federal country because the Constitution of India is federal in nature but unitary in spirit. It has common features of a federation such as written Constitution, supremacy of Constitution, rigidity of Constitution, two governments, division of powers, bicameralism as well as unitary features like single Constitution, integrated judiciary and All-India Services etc.
